info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN INDIANA AND SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ligonier, or 12 miles southeast of Latrobe, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ligonier, New Florence, Bolivar, Laurel Mountain, Loyalhanna Gorge, and Laurel Mountain State Park. This includes Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 92 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
